data.name: Margherita Pizza
data.description: Classic wood-fired pizza with fresh mozzarella, basil, and tomatoes.

data.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
data.description: Creamy spaghetti tossed with pancetta, egg, and Parmesan.

data.name: Chicken Tikka Masala
data.description: Grilled chicken in spiced tomato and cream sauce served with rice.

data.name: Caesar Salad
data.description: Crisp romaine lettuce, Parmesan, and croutons with Caesar dressing.

data.name: Veggie Burger
data.description: Grilled veggie patty with lettuce, tomato, and avocado on a toasted bun.

data.name: Sushi Platter
data.description: Assorted nigiri and rolls served with soy sauce and wasabi.

data.name: Butter Naan
data.description: Soft Indian flatbread brushed with butter, perfect with curries.

data.name: Grilled Salmon
data.description: Tender salmon fillet grilled to perfection with lemon-dill sauce.

data.name: Pad Thai
data.description: Stir-fried rice noodles with tofu, peanuts, egg, and tamarind sauce.

data.name: Beef Tacos
data.description: Three corn tortillas filled with seasoned beef, lettuce, and cheese.

data.name: Falafel Wrap
data.description: Chickpea falafel with tahini sauce and fresh veggies in pita bread.

data.name: French Fries
data.description: Crispy golden fries served with ketchup or aioli.

data.name: Greek Yogurt Parfait
data.description: Layers of yogurt, granola, and berries served in a glass.

data.name: Lemon Iced Tea

data.name: Mango Lassi
